doc.title: 2 Kings
doc.plot: Meet Moe, a "Vampire Jesus" human statue and local bully, who meets his match when another human statue sets up shop next door - a woman dressed as Las Vegas Elvis. When Elvis, aka Darlene, refuses to be pushed out of her spot, they engage in a battle royale - human statue style - and discover that together they can make more money than they ever could alone.

Meet Moe, a "Vampire Jesus" human statue and local bully, who meets his match when another human statue sets up shop next door - a woman dressed as Las Vegas Elvis. When Elvis, aka Darlene, refuses to be pushed out of her spot, they engage in a battle royale - human statue style - and discover that together they can make more money than they ever could alone.
